column1: alice s. korpi| alice s. korpi. born: july 04
column4: age 79 of 205 silver st. west ishpeming
column6: 2015 at the up health system marquette. alice was born july 4
column7: 1935 in republic to ernest & sylvia (warlin) kerkela. she graduated from republic high school
column8: class of 1953. alice enjoyed playing cribbage and throwing horseshoes. she was a member of the riverside club in west ishpeming and a member of the bethel lutheran church. she enjoyed time spent at the family camp
column9: k camp. she enjoyed babysitting her grandchildren
column11: nieces and nephews throughout the years alice is survived by a son wayne korpi of diamondhead
column13: son in law james kipling of ishpeming
column14: 2 sisters: la. verne noasconi of stephenson
column17: 2 grandchildren: brian kipling and kara (fiance josh) kipling
column19: sister in law kathy kerkela of republic along with nieces and nephews. alice was preceded in death by her parents
column21: a brother ernie kerkela and a sister gladys m. dawson. a memorial service will be held at 11:00 am on monday june 15th at the bethel lutheran church in ishpeming with rev. lauri o. maki officiating. the family will greet relatives and friends at the bethel lutheran church on monday from 10:00 am until the time of service at 11:00 am. a luncheon will be held in the church fellowship hall following the service. alice's obituary may be viewed at bjorkandzhulkie. com where relatives and friends may leave a note of remembrance. servicesmemorial service monday
column23: 201511:00 ambethel lutheran church 333 e. ridge st. ishpeming
